Coat rack as a clothing organizer: An additional shelf on a coat rack can be used to keep sweaters and scarves neat and tidy.
Coat rack as a bookshelf: A coat rack can be temporarily transformed into a bookshelf to display small books and decorative items.
Coat rack as a shoe organizer: A coat rack can be used to organize shoes in a closet or near the entrance.
Coat rack as a bike rack: For bicycles, adding hooks to a coat rack to hang the handlebars and use it as a mini bike rack.
Coat rack as plant label: Coat rack hooks can be used to hold tags for a garden, labeling which plants are where.
